targets.query: SELECT * FROM services WHERE time_range(_timestamp, '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}') AND service_name IN ([[service_name:singlequote]]) AND service_version IN ([[service_version:singlequote]]) AND region IN ([[region:singlequote]]) AND cluster_id IN ([[cluster_id:singlequote]]) AND cell_id IN ([[cell_id:singlequote]]) AND k8s_node_name IN ([[k8s_node_name:singlequote]]) AND k8s_pod_name IN ([[k8s_pod_name:singlequote]]) AND env IN ([[env:singlequote]]) AND severity IN ([[severity:singlequote]]) AND body LIKE '%$search_term%' ORDER BY _timestamp DESC LIMIT 1000
targets.rawSql:
SELECT *
FROM services
WHERE time_range(_timestamp, '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}')
  AND (
    (length('${trace_id:text}') > 0 AND trace_id = '${trace_id:text}')
    OR
    (length('${trace_id:text}') = 0
      AND app_name IN ([[app_name:singlequote]])
      AND app_version IN ([[app_version:singlequote]])
      AND service_name IN ([[service_name:singlequote]])
      AND service_version IN ([[service_version:singlequote]])
      AND region IN ([[region:singlequote]])
      AND cluster_id IN ([[cluster_id:singlequote]])
      AND k8s_node_name IN ([[k8s_node_name:singlequote]])
      AND k8s_pod_name IN ([[k8s_pod_name:singlequote]])
      AND env IN ([[env:singlequote]])
      AND severity IN ([[severity:singlequote]])
      AND body LIKE '%$search_term%'
    )
  )
ORDER BY _timestamp DESC
LIMIT ${limit}

panels.description: This datasource does not support full-range histograms. The graph below is based on the logs seen in the response limit.

targets.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as time, severity, count(*) FROM services WHERE time_range(_timestamp, '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}') AND service_name IN ([[service_name:singlequote]]) AND service_version IN ([[service_version:singlequote]]) AND region IN ([[region:singlequote]]) AND cluster_id IN ([[cluster_id:singlequote]]) AND cell_id IN ([[cell_id:singlequote]]) AND k8s_node_name IN ([[k8s_node_name:singlequote]]) AND k8s_pod_name IN ([[k8s_pod_name:singlequote]]) AND env IN ([[env:singlequote]]) AND severity IN ([[severity:singlequote]]) AND body LIKE '%$search_term%' GROUP BY time, severity ORDER BY time ASC
targets.rawSql:
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as time, severity, count(*)
FROM services
WHERE time_range(_timestamp, '${__from:date:iso}', '${__to:date:iso}')
  AND app_name IN ([[app_name:singlequote]])
  AND app_version IN ([[app_version:singlequote]])
  AND service_name IN ([[service_name:singlequote]])
  AND service_version IN ([[service_version:singlequote]])
  AND region IN ([[region:singlequote]])
  AND cluster_id IN ([[cluster_id:singlequote]])
  AND k8s_node_name IN ([[k8s_node_name:singlequote]])
  AND k8s_pod_name IN ([[k8s_pod_name:singlequote]])
  AND env IN ([[env:singlequote]])
  AND severity IN ([[severity:singlequote]])
  AND body LIKE '%$search_term%'
GROUP BY time, severity
ORDER BY time ASC
